title: Delicious Meals, Delivered Fresh
description: Savor the taste of home-cooked goodness anytime, anywhere with our freshly prepared dishes brought right to your door.

title: Spicy Beef Burger
description: Juicy flame-grilled beef layered with fresh lettuce, cheese, and our signature spicy sauce — a true burst of flavor in every bite.

title: Summer Combo Deal
description: Get 2 meals and 2 drinks at just ₹399. Perfect for sharing — but only available for a limited time!
